synopsis.text: Sakiko Horinomiya, a wealthy and influential girl, gathers five handsome yet flawed high school boys to compete in the prestigious 'Motemen Koshien' tournament. Furuta Tokio, Ashida Shigekazu, Tojima Koutarou, Sahashi Aki, and Gotouda Shun each possess a negative trait that hinders them in various ways. In order to repay their debts to Sakiko, the boys must work together to win the tournament and claim the prize money. Along the way, they discover personal growth, self-awareness, and budding feelings for Sakiko, making their journey to the championship an unforgettable one.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
